function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased energy consumption in residential buildings due to work from home practices during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Higher energy bills, increased environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implement smart energy-saving technologies, educate users on energy-saving habits","Technologies":"Smart power strips, energy monitoring systems, programmable thermostats, eco-showerheads, solar chargers, LED lighting","People":"Residents, environmental sustainability","Owner":"Architects, building designers, residents"},{"Description":"Population trapped in their homes during the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to increased demand for comfort and flexibility","Impact":"Mental and physical strain, decreased well-being, decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Design and construct smart houses with fast and robust internet connection, create flexible and adaptable living spaces","Technologies":"Smart house systems, fast internet connection","People":"Home occupants, especially those working or studying from home","Owner":"Architects, building designers"}]}
